Header.title: Empowering communities with YWEKE and CROSS Ministries
Header.paragraph: By 2030, Yweke wants to build the resilience of smallholder agricultural communities in six counties of remote rural Kenya by eradicating extreme poverty and establishing sustainable locally-owned agribusinesses.

About.paragraph: YWEKE is a grass root organization that has taken the lead in empowering youths, teenage mothers, orphans, widows and the elderly by promoting gender equality and initiating various training programs to acquire various skills in various fields as well as well as advocating for social injustices.

Testimonials.name: Julie Oganga

Features.title: Communication
Features.text: To partner and network with other like minded organization, individuals and state organs to create conducive environment for the vulnerable member of the society.

Features.title: Voice
Features.text: Improve the education of the beneficiaries especially the youths and young mothers in order to enable then gain skills and knowledge of using computers.

Features.title: Community
Features.text: To enhance the capacity of community to assess their strength, capabilities and resources.

Features.title: Serve
Features.text: Give proper medication, food, shelter to the elderly who are neglected by their families. Improve nutrition to the single young mothers.
